Title: 39631 - # Ways Online Technology Can Help You Run Your Small Business
Direction: 675 words. Create a list of 4-8 ways that online technology is helping small business owners run their companies. You can discuss things like cloud storage, online accounting software, online communication and collaboration applications, etc. Write for an audience of small business owners who are interested in technology. You can link to the target URL by discussing how online accounting software is helpful to small business owners.
Anchor Text: cloud accounting long-tail variation (exact match keyword in a phrase match format)
Extra Writer Notes: Example: cloud accounting keeps you organized
